trigger: Congress is scheduled to vote on a bill
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time Congress is scheduled to vote on a bill.

trigger: A legislator in Congress has a birthday
trigger_description: This Trigger fires on each legislator's birthday. Wish them a happy day!

trigger: New bill from search is introduced
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a new bill is introduced that matches your search query.

trigger: The president signs a new bill into law
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time the president signs a new bill into law.
This Trigger fires every time you have a new legislator representing you in Congress.
